en.title: Watch This Video!
en.content:
Lest we forget Compassion...Take a few minutes to watch this video and think about the poor and the needy who need our help (which is what FE's many charitable acts including "Christmas For Payatas", "Hope For Children", etc, is all about).This film is about the hunger and poverty brought about by globalization.. There are 25,000 people dying every day due to hunger and malnutrition. This short film shows a forgotten portion of society, the people who live on the refuse of men to survive. What is inspiring is the HOPE and the SPIRITUALITY that never left these people. 



View This Movie at cultureunplugged.com

meta.description: Watch this video and help whoever needs our help.
meta.keyword: Hunger, Christmas For Payatas, Hope For Children
meta.author: klhunter
